ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence

Interface SlotTranslator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SlotTranslatorImp

    public interface SlotTranslator
    Used to access the thicknesses/heights of slots from the backbone.
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double BOTTOM
      The bottom of a slot.
      static double CENTER
      The center of a slot.
      static double TOP
      The very top of a slot.

    • Method Detail

      • getHeightFromBackbone

        double getHeightFromBackbone(int slot,
                           double heightInSlot)
        Gives the point on the actual screen from the passed parameters.
        Parameters:
        slot - The slot we are in.
        heightInSlot - The height within the slot. Range of [BOTTOM, TOP]
        Returns:
        The actual height above the backbone.

      • getTopMostHeight

        double getTopMostHeight()
        Returns:
        The height above the backbone of the edge of the top most slot.

      • getBottomMostHeight

        double getBottomMostHeight()
        Returns:
        The height above the backbone of the edge of the bottom most slot.
